text: Now C has MTU of 1000 (bytes) including header. 1000-20 = 980 which is not divisible by 8 so, 976 is divisible by 8 2976 e 4 fragments 2000 e 3 fragments 2004 76 3 so, number of fragment on destination =4+3+3=10 The offset of last fragment is (2976 + 2000 + 2004 - 52)/8 = 866 Hence correct answer is 10
